commit_list.message:
Add a merge tag and shortcode (#2)

Add the merge tag {workflow_vacation} with modifiers, including: pto, comp_days, hr_adjustment, carry, approved and balance.
Add the shortcode [gravityflow page="vacation"] which takes "user_id" and "data" attributes.
